product_name: Aquaglide Klickitat HB Two Inflatable Kayak
long_description: With a wide outline for added comfort and improved stability, this maneuverable inflatable kayak has ample rocker for outstanding control on lakes, coastlines and tame rivers.
short_description: With a wide outline for added comfort and improved stability, this maneuverable inflatable kayak has ample rocker for outstanding control on lakes, coastlines and tame rivers.
